abstract: Do contracts matter anymore? That was my first thought after reading reports that an analyst at Friedman, Billings, Ramsey had speculated that Bank of America is likely to renegotiate its $4 billion deal to buy Countrywide Financial down to a range of zero to $2 per share — or completely walk away from it.
lead_paragraph: Do contracts matter anymore? That was my first thought after reading reports that an analyst at Friedman, Billings, Ramsey had speculated that Bank of America is likely to renegotiate its $4 billion deal to buy Countrywide Financial down to a range of zero to $2 per share — or completely walk away from it.
